issue.summary: Drop NCBI36 unlocalized scaffold NT_113927 b/c sole component is phase 1
issue.description: NCBI36 chr.15 unlocalized scaffold NT_113927 is comprised entirely of phase 1 sequence (AC139687.2).
issue.resolution_text: This scaffold/component is not included in GRCh37

issue.summary: Drop NCBI36 unlocalized scaffold NT_113926 b/c sole component is phase 1
issue.description: NCBI36 chr.15 unlocalized scaffold NT_113926 is comprised entirely of phase 1 sequence (AC139536.2).
issue.resolution_text: This scaffold/component is not included in GRCh37

issue.summary: Drop NCBI36 unlocalized scaffold NT_113925 b/c sole component is phase 1
issue.description: NCBI36 chr.15 unlocalized scaffold NT_113925 is comprised entirely of phase 1 sequence (AC139511.2).
issue.resolution_text: This scaffold/component is not included in GRCh37

issue.summary: Chr. 15 CHORI-17 Pathway: WAS gene family may have missing copies in the Reference
issue.description: Clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the telomeric region of Chr. 15 (AC140725.3). These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: This CH17 pathway does not meet the criteria to replace the reference or for alt_loci creation.

issue.summary: Chr. 15 CHORI-17 Pathway
issue.description: Clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC138749.5 - AC090982.4 region of Chr. 15. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: This CH17 TPF has been uploaded to the Chr. 15 ALT_REF_LOCI_2 TPF, representing a never-before reported inversion of ~120kb when aligned to GRCh37.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC138747.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383554.1 created to capture sequence from AC138747.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC138747.3, which represents a sequence variant to GRCh37 by containing ~11.4bp more than Reference component AC091304.15, has been uploaded to the Chr. 15 Alt-Ref-Loci TPF

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC209298.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383555.1 created to capture sequence from AC209298.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: AC209298.3, which represents a sequence variant to GRCh37 by containing ~12.1kb more than Reference component AC087382.11, has been uploaded to the Chr. 15 Alt-Ref-Loci TPF

issue.summary: Chr. 15 CHORI-17 Pathway: UBE2QP2 (Gene ID: 100134869)
issue.description: Clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AC026624.8 - AC105339.9 region of Chr. 15. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: AC243919.2 (CH17-159G14) and AC245033.2 (CH17-66N5) have been added to the Chr. 15 TPF, closing a gap in GRCh37 caused by haplotypic expansion.

issue.summary: Reference assembly representation of CYP19A1 (Gene ID: 1588) is not the clinical standard
issue.description: The GRCh37 representation of CYP19A1 differs from the clinical standard for this gene.
issue.resolution_text: The Reference assembly has the common allele at 5 of the 6 discrepancies listed for CYP19A1. The final discrepancy that wasn't common is not rare. For now, we will not change the representation of CYP19A1 in the Reference.

issue.summary: Reference assembly representation of CYP1A2 is not the clinical standard
issue.description: The GRCh37 representation of CYP1A2 differs from the clinical standard for this gene.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459683.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC091230.23 and making CYP1A2's alignment to the Reference the clinical standard.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC131280.9 and AC012414.12 in GRCh37 (NC_000015.9) - Prader-Willi region
issue.status_text: A CH17 pathway is currently being sequenced in an effort to represent a single-haplotype of the Prader-Willi region.
issue.description: This is a continuation of NCBI Build36 gap issues HG-737.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC126335.16 and AC068446.22 in GRCh37 (NC_000015.9) - Prader-Willi region
issue.status_text: A CH17 pathway is currently being sequenced in an effort to represent a single-haplotype of the Prader-Willi region.
issue.description: This is a continuation of NCBI Build36 gap issue HG-737.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC183089.3 and AC134980.3 in GRCh37 (NC_000015.9) - Prader-Willi region
issue.description: This is a continuation of NCBI Build36 gap issues HG-737.
issue.resolution_text: Gap components for this ticket are no longer valid following Prader-Willi re-arrangement in GRCh38. Further progress of this specific gap can now be followed in HG-2277.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC025884.28 and AC116165.8 in GRCh37 (NC_000015.9) - Prader-Willi region
issue.description: This is a continuation of NCBI Build36 gap issues HG-737, HG-741 and HG-751.
issue.resolution_text: Issue was created in error. This is a duplicate to HG-741.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC174469.1 and AC127522.7 in GRCh37 (NC_000015.9)
issue.description: This issue is a continuation of gap ticket HG-754
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of RP11 WGS scaffold AUXG01000149.1 to the Chromosome 15 TPF, this sequence gap is now closed.

issue.summary: GeneID: 2200 (FBN1) Rare/wrong base reported by clinical testing lab.
issue.description: The base at chr15:48,807,637 represents a rare or wrong allele that has not been seen in the 1000G data.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459685.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC022467.7 and improving the alignment of FBN1 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Possible 2bp deletion in IVD gene on AC013356.8
issue.description: Possible 2bp deletion in BAC AC013356.8 affecting a coding exon of a variant of gene IVD. All matching ESTs disagree with reference genome.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459687.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC013356.8 and improving the alignment of IVD to the Reference.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC103691.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC103691.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint between AC069368.14 and AC103691.2 has been curated to include all of AC103691.2's/1K-Genomes decoy sequence.

issue.summary: Assembly component AC138649.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Assembly component AC138649.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint between AC011767.12 and AC138649.2 has been curated to include all of AC138649.2's/1K-Genomes decoy sequence.

issue.summary: RPCI-11 components on the Chromosome 15 Unlocalized TPF align to the Prader-Willi region and either represent an alternate haplotype or missing sequence in the Reference.
issue.status_text: Currently reviewing ways to localize this contig to the Reference.
issue.description: 3 RPCI-11 components aligning to the Prader-Willi region of Chromosome 15 need localized.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: AC135069.17 (RP11-1081C20) is part of the decoy sequences but missing from the Reference.
issue.description: AC135069.17 (RP11-1081C20) is part of the decoy sequences but missing from the Reference.
issue.resolution_text: AC135069.17 has been placed on the Chromosome 15 Unlocalized TPF

issue.summary: RPCI-11 component which is part of the decoy sequences is on the Chromosome 15 Unlocalized TPF and aligns to the Prader-Willi region. It either represents an alternate haplotype or missing sequence in the Reference.
issue.description: RPCI-11 component AC135069.17 thats aligns to the Prader-Willi region of Chromosome 15 needs localized.
issue.resolution_text: AC135069.17 was added to the Chrom. 15 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC018901.8 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC018901.8 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC018901.8 was added to the Chrom. 15 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: GRCh37 pathway on Chr. 15 has been replaced to close gap but represents significant variation when compared to new pathway
issue.description: Recently replaced GRCh37 pathway should be placed on the Chr. 15 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF.
issue.resolution_text: This haplotype-variant pathway has been added to the Chr. 15 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF for capture in GRCh38. It represents an insertion/inversion haplotype compared to the path on chromosome 15. See HG-251 for more information regarding the chr. 15 path.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC225825.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC225825.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.resolution_text: AC225825.3 was added to the Chrom. 15 ALT_REF_LOCI_2 TPF to capture this 1K-genomes decoy sequence for GRCh38.

issue.summary: RPCI-11 sequences AC025138.14 and AC136687.6 represent a second RP11 haplotype in the Prader-Willi region
issue.description: RPCI-11 sequences AC025138.14 and AC136687.6 represent a second RP11 haplotype in the Prader-Willi region
issue.resolution_text: Prader-Willi RP11 accessions AC136687 and AC025138 have been placed on the Chrom. 15 ALT_LOCI_1 TPF in order to represent a second RP11 haplotype in the Prader-Willi region.

issue.summary: RPCI-11 sequences AC136352.10, AC020679.7 and AC171558.2 represent another RP11 haplotype in the Prader-Willi region
issue.description: RPCI-11 sequences AC136352.10, AC020679.7 and AC171558.2 represent another RP11 haplotype in the Prader-Willi region
issue.resolution_text: Prader-Willi RP11 accessions AC136352, AC020679 and AC171558 have been placed on the Chrom. 15 ALT_LOCI_1 TPF for representation of another RP11 haplotype in the Prader-Willi region.

issue.summary: RPCI-11 sequences AC060814.11, AC183088.2, AC135068.5 and AC134981.6 represent a second RP11 haplotype or another copy of a duplication in the Prader-Willi region.
issue.description: RPCI-11 sequences AC060814.11, AC183088.2, AC135068.5 and AC134981.6 represent a second RP11 haplotype in the Prader-Willi region
issue.resolution_text: AC060814.11, AC183088.2, AC135068.5 and AC134981.6 have been added to the Chr. 15 TPF

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Annotation in region suggest possibly assembly error
issue.status_text: Attempting to bring up sequence data for AC243657.2, which is a representation of this region on ALT_REF_LOCI_2, but does align without mis-assemblies to Ref. component AC055876.16.
issue.description: Comparison of annotation of PDCD6IPP2 in human and mouse suggests a possible assembly error in this region (NC_000015.10:28,789,664-28,859,007).
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Sequence needs added to Chr. 15 GRCh38 Alt_Loci contig NT_187660.1.
issue.description: Sequence needs added to Chr. 15 GRCh38 Alt_Loci contig NT_187660.1.
issue.resolution_text: This scaffold is a re-submission of GRCh38 Chr. 15 ALT_LOCI KI270905.1. In this scaffold, the gap between AC243679.3 and AC243687.3 is now closed with the addition of AC247157.4. Also, the gap between AC243653.3 and AC243660.3 is now closed with the addition of WGS sequence AMYH02030122.1. WGS sequence AMYH02030123.1 was added to the gap between AC243657.2 and AC243901.3, extending 109,869bp into the gap. Finally, AC253577.2 was added, extending 20,252bp off of AC243827.3 into the gap.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC021822.21
issue.status_text: Determining whether or not this Kidd issue should be added as a patch.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267182.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 15, suggest there may be ~2,111 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC021822.21. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC023300.19
issue.status_text: Determining best method to fix this issue.
issue.description: Analysis of GU269077.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 15, suggest there may be ~2,129 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC023300.19. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AC133637.2
issue.status_text: Awaiting final decision on if we should add AC231276.2/ABC10-46315500P15 or AC005317.2/pDJ457j11 as this is a Kidd 'Variation' issue.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268577.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 15, suggest there may be ~1,240 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AC133637.2. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC134981.6 and AC183089.3 in GRCh38.
issue.status_text: A CH17 pathway is currently being sequenced in an effort to represent a single-haplotype of the Prader-Willi region.
issue.description: There is an assembly gap between components AC244255.3 and AC006453.3 of NC_000002.12 (GRCh38). This ticket is a continuation of gap ticket HG-1405
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC025884.28 and AC100757.2 in GRCh38.
issue.status_text: A CH17 pathway is currently being sequenced in an effort to represent a single-haplotype of the Prader-Willi region.
issue.description: There is an assembly gap between components AC244255.3 and AC006453.3 of NC_000002.12 (GRCh38). This ticket is a continuation of gap ticket HG-741
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC116165.8 and AC242376.3 in GRCh38.
issue.status_text: A CH17 pathway is currently being sequenced in an effort to represent a single-haplotype of the Prader-Willi region.
issue.description: There is an assembly gap between components AC244255.3 and AC006453.3 of NC_000002.12 (GRCh38). This ticket is a continuation of gap ticket HG-751.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC136698.6 and AC243562.2 in GRCh38.
issue.description: There is an assembly gap between components AC244255.3 and AC006453.3 of NC_000002.12 (GRCh38). This ticket is a continuation of gap ticket HG-756
issue.resolution_text: RP11-720B5/AC256205.1 has been added to this region and AC136698.6/RP13-262C2 removed, confirming this GRCh38 gap (NC_000015.10:84,270,067-84,320,066) is closed.

issue.summary: ABBA01004580.1 needs added near the chr. 15 centromere in GRCh38.
issue.description: ABBA01004580.1 was added near the chr. 15 centromere in GRCh38 (NC_0000015.10)
issue.resolution_text: ABBA01004580.1 was added to the Reference Assembly, extending off of AC145435.3 and towards centromeric repeat of Chr. 15 for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Gamma inversion haplotype of the GOLGA8 locus, 15q13.3 region. (BP4-BP5 region)
issue.description: There is a gamma inversion haplotype of the GOLGA8 locus, 15q13.3 region. BP5 (NC_000015.10:30,024,843-32,704,893).
issue.resolution_text: This pathway has been uploaded to the Chr. 15 ALT_REF_LOCI_1 TPF for GRCh38.p3 release. This Alt_Loci will provide an alternate representation (~1.844 MB gamma inversion) of the following GRCh38 coordinates NC_000015.10:~30,260,000-32,480,000.

issue.summary: RP11 components AC091304.15 and AC138749.6 may overlap, but each most likely represent alternate RP11 alleles.
issue.status_text: Currently waiting on Miseq sequence data for RP11-139P12.
issue.description: RP11 components AC091304.15 and AC138749.6 may overlap, but each most likely represent alternate RP11 alleles (NC_000015.10:28,280,748-28,596,947).
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: A CH17 BAC pathway is being sequenced for the Prader-Willi region.
issue.status_text: We a currently sequencing the remaining clones in this pathway.
issue.description: A CH17 BAC pathway is currently being sequenced in the Prader-Willi region of Chr. 15.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Hsa15- LOC441706/LOC283767 problem region
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an inversion between AC127381.4 and AC116165.7
issue.resolution_text: As recommended by Mike Zody, the clone order of GRCh37 Chr. 15 scaffold NT_078094.2 (AC116165.8-AC100757.2) has been flipped, resolving this issue.

issue.summary: GeneID: 6218 (RPS17), may be redundant
issue.description: The transcript NM_001021.3 has two identical alignments to AC135995.7 and AC010724.6 in build 36.2.
issue.resolution_text: Optical map analysis demonstrated that the duplicate alignments of this gene and others in the region, as well as an assembly gap, were due a haplotype expansion. With the removal of the offending components and the addition of AC243919.2/CH17-159G14 and AC245033.2/CH17-66N5 to the Chr. 15 TPF, this region is now correctly assembled, representing one copy of RPS17 and other loci. An alternate loci scaffold represents an inversion haplotype of this region (see HG-1910).

issue.summary: GeneID: 5046 (PCSK6), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_002570.3 (PCSK6) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: WGS sequence AMYH02031172.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC087528.15 and improving the alignment of PCSK6 to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 8120 (AP3B2), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_004644.3 (AP3B2) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: PCR product has been submitted to Genbank with the accession FJ695193.

issue.summary: GeneID: 9187 (SLC24A1), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_004727.2 (SLC24A1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: This ticket is the same as ticket number HG-426 in which the reference contains and extra C. The accession AC027220.9 was updated to accession AC027220.10 in NCBI and the extra C at bp position 63,704,670 was removed. The reference will now match the mRNA.

issue.summary: GeneID: 10002 (NR2E3), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_014249.2 (NR2E3) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF495720.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC104938.7 and improving the alignment of NR2E3 to the Reference.

issue.summary: GeneID: 23336 (DMN), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_145728.2 (DMN) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: With the addition of AC223423.3 to the TPF (HG-971) and the Reference now using AC223423.3's entire sequence, this issue is resolved.

issue.summary: GeneID: 55889 (GOLGA6B), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_018652.4 (GOLGA6B) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: The accession AC009712.21 was updated to AC009712.22 in NCBI shortly after the last build. This updated accession contains the extra G found at 1683 of the NM. This should be reflected in build 37 and will resolve this issue.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Possible base error
issue.description: Genome sequence error.
issue.resolution_text: The sequence was fixed by WIBR, but was not uploaded to Genbank for Build 36. Build 37 should reflect the correct sequence.

issue.summary: Chr. 15 Gap Problem Region #1
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC145196.2 and AC136992.4
issue.resolution_text: AC136992 was removed from the tilepath and replaced with AC145167. AC145167 extended father out into the gap and the PCR product EU606048 spanned the gap between AC145196 and AC145167.

issue.summary: Chr. 15 Gap Problem Region #2
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC145436.2 and AC144833.2
issue.resolution_text: Continued work on this gap can be followed in HG-752.

issue.summary: Chr. 15 Gap Problem Region #3
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC055876.16 and AC127522.7
issue.resolution_text: Gap size has been updated to 1kb to reflect correct gap size and extension.

issue.summary: Chr. 15 Gap Problem Region #4
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AC144834.2 and AC144835.2
issue.resolution_text: Please see JIRA ticket HG-757 for further progress.

issue.summary: Unplaced contig NT_113928 may extend into assembly gap
issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113928 may extend into an assembly gap
issue.resolution_text: AC145167.2 has been updated into our tilepath and replaces AC136992.4

issue.summary: Chr. 15 Reference Assembly Gap
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC126335.16 and AC134980.3.
issue.resolution_text: Components AC068446.22 and AC183089.3 were placed in this gap. Further progress on this specific region and the resulting 2 gaps can be found in HG-1404 and HG-1405.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC025884.28 and AC116165.8 in NCBI Build36 (NC_000015.8) - Prader-Willi region
issue.description: Chr. 15 Reference Assembly gap between AC025884.28 and AC116165.7
issue.resolution_text: Gap components for this ticket are no longer valid following Prader-Willi re-arrangement in GRCh38. Further progress of this specific gap can now be followed in HG-2278.

issue.summary: Ch.15 Reference Assembly gap between AC145196.2 and AC136992.4.
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC145196.2 and AC136992.4.
issue.resolution_text: AC136992 was removed from the tilepath and replaced with AC145167. AC145167 extended father out into the gap and the PCR product EU606048 spanned the gap between AC145196 and AC145167.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC100757.2 and AC100756.4 in NCBI Build36 (NC_000015.8) - Prader-Willi region
issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between AC100757.2 and AC100756.4.
issue.resolution_text: Gap components for this ticket are no longer valid following Prader-Willi re-arrangement in GRCh38. Further progress of this specific gap can now be followed in HG-2279.

issue.description: Ch.15 Reference Assembly gap between AC145436.3 and AC144833.3.
issue.resolution_text: EU606049.1 has been placed into the tile path and closes this gap

issue.summary: Ch.15 Reference Assembly gap between AC091304.15 and AC138749.5.
issue.description: Ch.15 Reference Assembly gap between AC091304.15 and AC138749.5.
issue.resolution_text: The alignment between the two accessions was curated using Gbench and changed to a green ball join. This gap is now closed.

issue.summary: Ch.15 Reference Assembly gap between AC055876.16 and AC127522.7
issue.description: Ch.15 Reference Assembly gap between AC055876.16 and AC127522.7
issue.resolution_text: Further progress on this gap issue can be followed in HG-1407.

issue.summary: Ch.15 Reference Assembly gap between AC135995.7 and AC126339.6
issue.description: Ch.15 Reference Assembly gap between AC135995.7 and AC126339.6
issue.resolution_text: Recently sequenced AC243919.2 (CH17-159G14) and AC245033.2 (CH17-66N5) close this gap in the Reference.

issue.summary: Ch.15 Reference Assembly gap between AC136704.9 and AC048382.7
issue.description: Ch.15 Reference Assembly gap between AC136704.9 and AC048382.7
issue.resolution_text: Gap components for this ticket are no longer valid following the removal of AC136704.9 on the left side of this gap in GRCh38. Further progress of this specific gap can now be followed in HG-2280.

issue.summary: Ch.15 Reference Assembly gap between AC144834.2 and AC144835.2.
issue.description: Ch.15 Reference Assembly gap between AC144834.2 and AC144835.2.
issue.resolution_text: EU606050 has been placed into the tilepath and closes the gap.

issue.summary: GeneID: 145845 (LOC145845), poor quality (includes component misassembly)
issue.description: Questionable identity of NC_000015.9 nt 37,161,041 affects positioning of intron/exon boundary in NR_024264.1 (GeneID: 145845 (LOC145845)).
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contig KF459686.1 has been added to GRCh38, patching AC018563.7 and improving the alignment of LOC145845 to the Reference.

issue.summary: Fosmid AC203659.3 missing from GRCh37
issue.description: Fosmid AC203659.3 is missing from GRCh37.
issue.resolution_text: AC203659.3, part of the 1K-Genomes decoy sequence, will be kept in the Chrom. 15 TPF and captured for GRCh38.

issue.summary: AC100756.5's name (RP11-529J17) is also assigned to AC090415.5
issue.status_text: The GRC database now indicates that AC100756 and AC090415 are unknown. Currently there is no way to know the correct clone name for each accession
issue.description: Clone name RP11-529J17 is assigned both to AC100756 and AC090415.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible missing sequence in assembly component AC036108.19
issue.description: Assembly component AC036108.19 may be missing approximately 3 kb sequence
issue.resolution_text: The TPF has been updated and AC223423.3 has been added to capture the 'unsure' sequence from AC036108.19 (3,019bp).
